question: How effectively does your organization communicate its mission and values to all employees?
How frequently do leaders visibly champion and model desired organizational values?
To what extent do employees feel respected and included regardless of their background?
How effectively does the organization address and prevent bias or discrimination?
How valued do employees feel for their contributions?
How regularly are outstanding efforts formally recognized or rewarded?
How supported do employees feel regarding mental health and work-life balance?
How reasonable are expectations around workload and after-hours communication?
How comfortable are employees giving honest feedback to managers or leadership?
How transparent is internal communication on company decisions and direction?
How accessible are skill-building or upskilling opportunities within the organization?
How clear are career progression paths and promotion criteria?
How collaborative and trusting is the work environment among peers?
How frequently are cross-functional teams encouraged and enabled to work together?
To what extent do employees feel empowered to take initiative and make decisions?
